column4: I got this old laptop with a sitecom wifi card (those big ass cards).   iwconfig shows - - - lo no wireless extensions. eth0  - - - no wireless extensions. Anyone that can help me get this right? In addition I have done a ndiswrapper guide without luck.
run: sudo lshw -C network    and you will see the chip used, you can find guides based on that
look at this please. its gibberish for me :) http://pastebin.com/4a5HuRS1
is the device a USB device?
nope. a bigass card that can be removed
cardbus?
oh PCMCIA ?
you know one of those large cards you put into the side of the laptop.
yeah, PCMCIA
yeah pcmcia seems right , google images
try: lspci   see if it shows there
http://pastebin.com/xZsZHhvA
ok, its this: SiteCom Europe BV Device 9780 (rev 01)    it will help find guides
ok ill start looking around. thanks so far :)
what is the output of: lsusb too, just for completeness
http://pastebin.com/8z4DStFS
any additional info in there?
ok, no help with lsusb
im so lost.... could you help me find a decent guide?im so bumdout
im so lost.... could you help me find a decent guide?im so bumdout...
I'd try ndisgtk
program manager says its already a newer version installed
then use it with the windows driver for the device
